subject: College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: West Virginia Coach Rich Rodriguez refused to discuss Michigan’s vacant coaching job at a news conference. Rodriguez said at the opening of a previously scheduled news conference on No. 11 West Virginia’s trip to the Fiesta Bowl that he would only talk about preparations to face No. 3 Oklahoma.Sporting News Radio reported Friday, citing unidentified sources, that Rodriguez and his agent were in Toledo, Ohio, meeting with Michigan Athletic Director Bill Martin and the university president, Mary Sue Coleman.
